question: 消しゴム
sourceMnemonic: You've seen the word <ja>消す</ja>, I hope. This comes from that. You're extinguishing something with <ja>ゴム</ja>. <ja>ゴム</ja> is a word for either gummy or rubbery things. So, this is a gummy thing that extinguishes something. This is an <vocabulary>eraser</vocabulary> that extinguishes pencil markings.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>消す</ja>, so make sure you know that word so you can read this one!
